Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
30.09.2014 SH SCR19072 Re-designed program
29.08.2014 JH SCR19108 Added new virtuals for presentation of DBHS_VALUE_OLD/NEW to present thousand separators
30.06.2014 GB SCR18999 OK button/When 'No' is clicked ...: changed condition for update value of DBHS_SUBMITTED
18.06.2014 GB SCR18971 Set sequence, changed condition for mess Approve all changes?
04.03.2014 SH SCR18749 Changed approval handling (selection CAPP)
18.01.2014 GB SCR18645 Added subtask StartOnline, rebuild Online with DQSL, added subtask Added ApproveAllChanges
13.01.2014 GB SCR18640 OK button: added additional test "Approval only allowed for users with department role CAPP_DEPARTMENT"
06.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
16.01.2012 SH SCR16905 Changed DBHS access now with DBHS_ID = MQDT_INVO_NO
-- Client is already locked by user: & user who is locking & Please try later
-- Lock client
-- Check messages if not already locked
... lock MQ (active user)
... reset client lock
(No need to reset MQ lock, MQ is already deleted)
-- Lock client
-- Info to users: "Not all client field changes are approved ..."
... reset client lock
-- Ask user to approve all client field changes in one cycle
-- Check if remaining fields for approval exists for the current selected client
... remaining fields exist, return to overview "Display approval fields"
... no remaining fields exists, return to "Client selection" screen or close OMQ257
... check if data exists for further approval (for another client)
... return to "Client selection"

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from (select count(distinct(MQDT_INVO_NO)) from :1/MQDT where :2 group by MQDT_INVO_NO) as SUM
select MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO, count(DISTINCT(MQDT_INVO_NO)) from :1/MQDT where :2 group by MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO having count(DISTINCT(MQDT_INVO_NO)) > 0 order by MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO
select MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO, count(DISTINCT(MQDT_INVO_NO)) from :1/MQDT where :2 group by MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO order by MQDT_ADMNO, MQDT_CLNTNO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
select MQDT_INVO_NO from :1/MQDT where :2 group by MQDT_INVO_NO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Error: "You cannot approve your own changes"
-- Error: "Approval only allowed for users in" & HOFF_NAME (HOFF_CODE = MQDT_HOFF_CODE)
-- Error: Approval only allowed for users with department role & CAPP_DEPARTMENTROLE
-- Approval is allowed, continue within separate task (Transaction)

ExpSyntax.val: (ISNULL ({0,13}) OR {0,13}='' OR {0,13}=User (0)) AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,8},'M')>0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MQDT_INVO_NO, max(MQDT_USRID), max(MQDT_LINENO) from :1/MQDT where :2 group by MQDT_INVO_NO

Text.val: -- Error: "You cannot approve your own changes"
-- Error: "Approval only allowed for users with department role" & CAPP_DEPARTMENTROLE
-- Check if one of the messages for the approval field is locked
(not in case of single approval, then MQ is locked already before)
... lock MQ (not in case of single approval, then MQ is locked already before)
(any of the MQ rows which is in the MQDT_INVO_NO will be locked)
... no errors occured (MQ is locked), perform the approval handling
-- Update DBHS in a separate task, BCA001 probably also updates the DBHS row
-- Perform final approval steps
... activate client field changed
... delete all message for the approved field
